dmca.title: DMCA Complaint
dmca.body:
EMAIL

http://www.panamasport-fishing.com/Gatun_Lake_202x203.jpg ,
http://www.panamasport-fishing.com/8-gatun-swimbass_232x150.jpg,
http://www.panamasport-fishing.com/areag_317x223.jpg

*This complainant already has a signature on file with us.
Please find attached below the full complaint:

------------------------
From: [private] <[private]@panamafishingandcatching.com>
Subject: Re: [#205039583] DMCA Complaint
Date: Wed, 10 Oct 2007 18:44:15 -0700 (PDT)

Hi Google Team
Sorry for all the hassle, I guess you can tell I am
not a lawyer! Here is the Information as requested -
1. Infringing site:
www.panamasport-fishing.com/spots.htm (or location of
picture/JPEG)- there are 3 pictures located on that
webpage at the top and are labeled
http://www.panamasport-fishing.com/Gatun_Lake_202x203.jpg,
a chart of Gatun lake and
http://www.panamasport-fishing.com/8-gatun-swimbass_232x150.jpg,
a picture of a fish in the water and
http://www.panamasport-fishing.com/areag_317x223.jpg,
a color chart of the Gulf fo Panama.
2. Copyrighted site:
www.panamafishingandcatching.com/gatun.htm
2. Copyrighted site:
www.panamafishingandcatching.com/1-gulf.htm
3. Description of exact text/images which have
been copied. - All the text on the right side of the
infringing URL www.panamasport-fishing.com/spots.htm
was taken from my copyrited webpage
www.panamafishingandcatching.com/gatun.htm
Three of the 4 pictures on
www.panamasport-fishing.com/spots.htm were taken from
my web pages. they are
1) a picture of an aerial chart of gatun lake which is
mostly tan colored and has GATUN LAKE printed in the
middle of it
2) a photograph of a fish on the surface of the water.
3) picture of a color chart of the Gulf Of Panama
which Has BAY OF PANAMA printed inside the picture at
the top center and is mostly tan colored for the
mainland and the ocean part is several shades of blue
denoting the depth.
Numbers 1 and 2 were taken from my web site
www.panamafishingandcatching.com/gatun.htm and number
3 was taken from my website
www.panamafishingandcatching.com/1-gulf.htm
hope this will resolve this matter and thank you for
your time and patience.
Best regards- Capt. [private]
